channel.title: Virtual Box Shared Folder Issues
channel.description:
[html]

Shared Folders aren’t working with the latest Linux kernel.

Possible workarounds, more information, etc. can be found in the Whonix User Help Forum discussion thread: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Special:AWCforum/st/id261/VirtualBox_shared_directories_on….html

[/html]
